title: My Daughter Wants Me To Save Her
description:
Michelle's 24-year-old daughter wants to move out of her shack-up situation and is asking her parents for the money to do it. - Dr. Laura: "Michelle's 24-year-old daughter wants to move out of her shack-up situation and is asking her parents for the money to do it."

Are you able to let your child fail in order to learn how to succeed? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
